title: forge问题（？，求助40金粒
author: gxgwvtft
txt_content:
forge mod loader has found a problem
  the mods and versions listed below could not be found
 Forge：minimum version required is 9.11.1.945
  The file ‘ForgeModLoager-client-0.log’contains more information

字是这样，为了防图挂我就发字吧。。。。。求助

replies.author: 孟山都
replies.txt_content: forge版本太低，需要升级，用MCLauncherBN.exe 启动器，点击下载中心/下载forge，下载所需版本即可~望采纳，谢谢

replies.author: lzllzllzl
replies.txt_content: 你的forge版本太低了，需要9.11.1.945的版本

replies.txt_content:
